description: Number of partitions of n into 2 distinct squares.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
mathematica: a[ n_] := If[ n < 0, 0, Sum[ Boole[ n == i^2 + j^2], {i, Sqrt[n]}, {j, 0, i - 1}]]; (* _Michael Somos_, Jun 24 2015 *)a[ n_] := Length@ PowersRepresentations[ n, 2, 2] - Boole @ IntegerQ @ Sqrt[2 n]; (* _Michael Somos_, Jun 24 2015 *)a[ n_] := SeriesCoefficient[ With[ {f = (EllipticTheta[ 3, 0, x] + 1)/2, g = (EllipticTheta[ 3, 0, x^2] + 1)/2}, f f - g] / 2, {x, 0, n}]; (* _Michael Somos_, Jun 24 2015 *)
prog: (Haskell)a025435 0 = 0a025435 n = a010052 n + sum   (map (a010052 . (n -)) $ takeWhile (< n `div` 2) $ tail a000290_list)-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Dec 20 2013{a(n) = if( n<0, 0, sum(i=1, sqrtint(n), sum(j=0, i-1, n == i^2 + j^2)))}; /* _Michael Somos_, Jun 24 2015 */
author: _David W. Wilson_
